title: Meatballs with White Wine Mushroom Sauce

ingredients.content: 4 sprigs fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only
20 g olive oil, plus extra for frying
500 g rump steak, trimmed, cut into pieces (4 cm) and slightly frozen
60 g Parmesan cheese, crust removed and cut into cubes (3 cm)
200 g chestnut mushrooms, cut into thin slices
1 pinch fine sea salt, to taste
1 pinch ground black pepper, to taste
1 sprig fresh flat-leaf parsley, for garnishing

preparations.content: Place bread in mixing bowl and grate <b>5 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place onion, parsley and dried herbs in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add olive oil and sauté <b>3 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Add rump steak and chop <b>15 sec/speed 8<b>, or until an evenly-chopped chunky consistency is achieved.
Add milk, egg, salt, pepper and reserved breadcrumbs then combine <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>.

Form the mince mixture into approx. 20 small meatballs. Place a medium-sized non-stick frying pan over medium heat and add oil. Cook meatballs until browned all over and cooked through (approx. 4-5 minutes). You may need to cook meatballs in 2 batches.
Transfer meatballs into a thermal serving bowl or other large bowl and set aside to keep warm. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place Parmesan in mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place a ceramic or glass bowl onto mixing bowl lid, then weigh white wine into it. Add cornflour to ceramic or glass bowl and combine until cornflour has dissolved.
Place garlic and shallot in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>, or until a finely chopped consistency is achieved. Repeat if necessary. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add mushrooms and cook <b>2 min/100°C//speed <b>, placing simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid.
Add reserved cornflour-wine mixture and cook <b>2 min/100°C//speed <b>, placing simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid.
Add salt, pepper, reserved Parmesan and cream then cook <b>4 min/90°C//speed <b>, or until sauce is heated and warm, placing simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid.
Serve meatballs with mushroom sauce and garnish with flat-leaf parsley before serving.

hintsAndTricks: Meatballs in mushroom sauce are delicious served with fresh crusty bread and a green salad.
